scene_description_enriched: A circular motif, possibly representing a halo or a celestial body, is depicted with a blue outer ring and an inner area filled with speckled gold and brown tones. A fragment of red and orange color is visible on the left, suggesting a garment or drapery. The overall impression is abstract and lacks clear figural or architectural elements.
scene_interpretation: No specific religious or biblical scene can be identified due to the abstract and fragmented nature of the image.
